name: Nagagutsu o Haita Neko: Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Daibouken
overview: Nagagutsu o Haita Neko: Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Daibouken is a 1986 video game based on the third film of The Wonderful World of Puss 'n Boots that was released exclusively in Japan for the Family Computer. Four years later, the game (with several modifications) was released in North America under the title Puss 'n Boots: Pero's Great Adventure.
